original_text: And he took six hundred chosen chariots, and all the chariots of Egypt, and captains over every one of them.
korean_text: 선발된 병거 육백 대와 애굽의 모든 병거를 동원하니 지휘관들이 다 거느렸더라

sentences.original_text: And he took six hundred chosen chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 육백 대의 뽑힌 전차를 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: and all the chariots of Egypt
and captains over every one of them
